name: 蘇春
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及 X 光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their Mechanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.
